name: Words'N'Blox 2
description:
A brand new word-puzzler, unlike any word game you've played before! With the ability to shift columns and rows, you have a better chance of finding words. But be careful! Making too many moves will cause you to loose a life.

Be strategic in your choices and careful with your moves! Find words of given lengths to complete all targets and level up.

* Relaxing gameplay, no time pressure
* Increasing difficulty level and target word lengths
* Beautiful, simplistic graphics
* Catchy soundtrack

Beat your previous highscore, or beat the game!
